operator_entity.description: Legal entity operating the facility (Section/Page: p.1)

plant_owner.description: Legal entity owning physical plant (Section/Page: p.1)

hospital_characterization.description: Entire hospital characterized as (Section/Page: p.2) Multi-select

cms_certification.description: CMS certification (entire facility) (Section/Page: p.2) If applicable

ownership_type.description: Managing organization type (Section/Page: p.2) Select one

ownership_other.description: Other Ownership Details (Section/Page: p.2) Required if “Other …” selected

chna_url.description: Community Health Needs Assessment (CHNA) URL (Section/Page: p.2) Provide URL if posted online; else send via email

mgmt_emergency.description: Emergency Services Management Contractor (Section/Page: p.2) Name/contact if applicable

util_*.description: Facility Utilization by Category (Section/Page: p.3-4) Same structure as AHQ Short; include LTAC category

race_*.description: Inpatients and Days by Racial Group (Section/Page: p.4) Counts and days tables

eth_*.description: Inpatients and Days by Ethnicity (Section/Page: p.4)

op_visits.description: Outpatient Visits (Section/Page: p.4) On/off campus and total

pay_*.description: In/Outpatients by Primary Payment (Section/Page: p.4) Totals must tie to visits/admissions

charity_inpatients.description: Charity Care Inpatients (Section/Page: p.4) > 50% of cost covered by charity

or_*.description: OR (Class C) rooms/cases/hours by category (Section/Page: p.5) As in AHQ Short

equip_*.description: Equipment inventory and contracted suppliers (Section/Page: p.9-10)

rev_ip_[payer].description: Inpatient Net Revenue by Source (Section/Page: p.11)

rev_op_[payer].description: Outpatient Net Revenue by Source (Section/Page: p.11)

sd_entity.description: Hospital or Health Care System (Section/Page: p.12) If system-wide report, list included hospitals

sd_contact_name.description: Contact Person for this Section (Section/Page: p.12)

sd_state_specific.description: State-specific data availability/explanation (Section/Page: p.12) Required if not all data State-specific

sd_capex_total.description: Total Qualifying Capital Expenditures (Section/Page: p.12) If none, skip to D

sd_act_pct.description: Calculated Percentages (Section/Page: p.12) Derived from amounts/total

sd_seeking_categories.description: Seeking supplier diversity in categories (Section/Page: p.13) Question D

sd_plan_outreach.description: Plan to alert/encourage enterprises (Section/Page: p.13) Question E

sd_board_help.description: How IHFSRB can assist (Section/Page: p.13) Question G

sd_vendor_contact.description: Vendor/supplier point of contact (Section/Page: p.14) Question I

sd_vendor_enroll.description: Vendor/supplier enrollment process (Section/Page: p.14) Question J

sd_success_examples.description: Examples of successful recruitment (Section/Page: p.14) Question K
